item.description:
Jun 26 - Hustle & Flow - Networking Salon for Young Professionals (7:30-9:30)
The Greatest Bar in Boston - 262 Friend Street- Upstairs - 4th Floor Ages:27-44
PAYMENT POLICY:
$20 if pre-paid


*********SAVE $5****************
Pay here: http://bostonsxedsalo...
Cut & Paste the URL into your browser
*********SAVE $5****************


Just because it`s summer doesn`t mean you can`t meet contacts for fall. Get ahead of the crowd and join us for a `speed` networking event at Lattitude.

THE HOW`S & WHY`S
You`ll meet with every other professional in the room for 5 minutes (the `hustle`) and try to make a connection (the `flow`). Make business or social contacts! You`ll be free to exchange contact info, so bring plenty of business cards.


MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR 5 MINUTES
Before the first round begins, a communications/interviewing specialist will give us all a quick lesson in how to network and `pitch` effectively and successfully.


MEET & GREET
We`ll have 1-2 professionals on hand to faciliate introductions and introduce you to other attendees.

WE`LL HELP SPREAD THE LOVE
If you`re interested in getting your name, brand or service out to the masses you can show up at Lattitude early (no later than 7pm) and give us your promotional materials and we`ll distribute them for you at check in. We`ll make sure your card or flyer gets out there. (Note: You should be responsible for what contact info is printed on these materials.)

Sponsored by:
http://www.moxieinthe...

http://www.moxieinthe...

item.name: Jun 26 - Hustle & Flow - Networking Salon for Young Professionals
